Projects

Here are some some projects I've worked on either under the supervision of a professor or for a course

A neuro-symbolic method for understanding free-text medical evidence

Medical evidence Dependency (MD)â€“informed attention, an extension of Multi-head self-attention that incorporates medical domain knowledge into a neural model. (Published in JAMIA)

Model Design for Deep Learning in Practice

Report on the effect of architecture, initialization, optimization, and regularization choices on classification performance. Testing against the MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, Kuzushiji-MNIST, and Kuzushiji-49 datasets. (Final project for STAT 5242)

DataFest 2019

Random forests to assess the influence of religious and sociopolitical factors on the 2016 presidential election. (1st place at Datafest 2019)

PS!ABM

Agent-based modelling framework for competitive Pokémon battles. (Final project for CMPLXSYS 530)

Misc Projects

Here are some projects I've worked on for fun, or to learn some new technology.

Poke2Vec

Pokémon vector embeddings generated via Word2Vec model on a simulated metagame.

Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold Skill Simulator

Flask-based skill tree visualization and planning tool for Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold.

Etrian Odyssey Nexus Compendiums

More readily searchable version of the Item and Monster lists from Etrain Odyssey Nexus.

Etrian Odyssey Untold Skill Simulator

Flask-based skill tree visualization and planning tool for Etrian Odyssey Untold.

EOV Party Builder

Javascript-based party planning tool for Etrian Odyssey V.

Smogon Usage Stats Visualizer

Flask-based web application to visualize usage trends in online Pokémon battles.

ProtoCat

Open source online catalog to store and share lab protocols. (Best Software Award at iGEM 2016)
